measurements_data.source: GIZ and SWEEP-Net. 2014e. "Country Report on the Solid Waste Management in Lebanon." April.

measurements_data.comments: UNDP 2014 estimates that the incremental daily quantity of MSW attributed to refugees is expected to reach 324,568 tonnes/year by 2014; this value is significant and is equivalent to around 15.7 percent of the waste generated by Lebanese residents prior to the crisis.
